Plot an sf object

Source: R/tc_map.R
tc_map.Rd

Plot an sf object. This is mostly a wrapper around plot(st_geometry(x), ...).

tc_map(x, col = "grey80", border = "grey20", lwd = 0.7, bg, add = FALSE, ...)

Arguments

x

object of class sf or sfc
col

color
border

border color
lwd

border width
bg

background color
add

whether to add the layer to an existing plot (TRUE) or not (FALSE)
...

further parameters from plot for sfc objects

Examples

library(sf)
mtq <- tc_import_mtq()
tc_map(mtq)

tc_map(mtq, bg = "green", col = "blue")
